subject: Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: During expeditions to Alaska, Jeremy Jones and Teton Gravity Research look for team members who are as versatile as they are dependable. No one embodies this better than the crew’s camp cook.
snippet: During expeditions to Alaska, Jeremy Jones and Teton Gravity Research look for team members who are as versatile as they are dependable. No one embodies this better than the crew’s camp cook.
